mapper.sql: id, bill_id, bill_no, file_name, template_url, describe, cartons, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill_clearance_info (bill_id, bill_no, file_name, template_url, describes,status,user_id,user_name,create_time) VALUES (#{billId}, #{billNo}, #{fileName}, #{templateUrl}, #{describes},1,#{userId},#{userName},now())
mapper.update: UPDATE bill_clearance_info SET bill_id = #{billId},bill_no = #{billNo},file_name = #{fileName}, template_url = #{templateUrl},describes = #{describes},status = #{status},user_id=#{userId},user_name=#{userName},create_time=now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.b_id,t.b_name,t.bill_id,t.bill_no,t.case_id,t.carton_no,t.create_time,t.order_no from clearance_info_case t where b_id= #{b_id}
select t.id,t.bill_id,t.bill_no,t.file_name,t.template_url,t.describes,t.cartons,t.status,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time from bill_clearance_info t where t.id = #{id}
select count(*) total from clearance_info_case where b_id = #{b_id}
